results.content: This course has relevant information and content which is definitely useful for you. The overall topic coverage is also good. But the tutor talks a little fast so if you have any problem with speed slow down the speed.

results.content: I like this course. The speaker shared a lot of info with regards to setting and customizing WordPress, it's really for beginners.  I really love the "Earning From WordPress Blogging" topic since it's an eye opener for me for available options in monetizing my WordPress blog. I just hope that the the course audio is louder since I turned my volume to Max just to hear the speaker clearly also I hope that there's an update to this course since this was recorded way back 2018, a lot of things changed back then. But overall, I learned a lot.
results.content_html: I like this course. The speaker shared a lot of info with regards to setting and customizing WordPress, it's really for beginners. I really love the "Earning From WordPress Blogging" topic since it's an eye opener for me for available options in monetizing my WordPress blog. I just hope that the the course audio is louder since I turned my volume to Max just to hear the speaker clearly also I hope that there's an update to this course since this was recorded way back 2018, a lot of things changed back then. But overall, I learned a lot.
